features: MEDICAL FIRST AID TAPE: Professional-grade microporous medical adhesive surgical first aid tape.
SAFE & SIMPLE: Skin-safe, breathable microweave ensures comfort during prolonged use.
BEST VALUE: Longer than competition, includes six medical first aid tape rolls (5/8" x 10yrds each).
QUALITY ASSURANCE: All Swiss Safe Medical Supplies are manufactured in Approved Medical Facilities.
OUR PROMISE: Swiss Safe promises customer satisfaction and our items to be free of any manufacturer defects. This product is FSA / HSA eligible.
body.description: Swiss Safe Premium Quality Microporous Medical Tape Our First Aid Tape Rolls are manufactured of a porous microfiber weave for ultimate comfort and durability during daily use. We are trusted both by home and professional users to deliver top quality medical supplies you can trust. Skin Safe Our tape is gentle on sensitive skin and will not rip out hair or leave excessive sticky residue. It is permeable and breathable to ensure comfort during prolonged use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality great price
reviews.reviewText: I always like to test my first aid products on myself before I have to use them in a emergency. This tape held up great. I work around a lot of water and it held tight while also letting everything breathe that was under it. It did lose a little stickiness when it was soaking wet. BUT that is soo much better than most other brands that just come completely undone, and its not . Good price, great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Swiss Safe First Aide Tape Surgical tape 5/8 " x 10 yards length.
reviews.reviewText: I was happy when I received my fast order of the Surgical tape 5/8 x 10yards length. most tapes are only 1/2" in length and it is good that I got another of different size. It is good to have different sizes as itcan always be used in emergency cases. thank you for my shipment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stays on but not perfect
reviews.reviewText: I burned my leg recently and needed to keep ointment on the skin. The tape I got from my first aid kit did not stay on so I ordered this.The tape is durable and sticky without being messy or tacky. It was easy to tear off when applying. The downside is when I put on pants sometimes the tape does roll back while some of the other strips stays on fine.I have slept with it on and notice that it does roll into itself or sticks to the bedding. Even though this occurs, the entire bandage is still on my leg!!!While not perfect, it does the job I need it to do which is to keep the gauze pad over my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Post it notes have more adhesive
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my first aid kits, and when I needed to use it, found that it will not even hold gauze in place. Very disappointed with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Swiss safe first aid tape
reviews.reviewText: The tape was very nice, but not for my patient. I am a caregiver for my husband. He has to have it bound in certain areas, and this just was not strong for him. It would have been fine for an arm, but not for a leg, where it was need.Thank you for the product.Sincerely,Caregiver

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not enough glue
reviews.reviewText: Did not work at all. Total junk. Tried to hold a bandage in place and it unraveled imediately. Not even worth the time it would take to return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality medical grade tape
reviews.reviewText: I had knee surgery and this tape worked well for securing bandages. It’s strong and stays in place….I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This tape is perfect for wrapping up injuries or sprains. It’s narrow, strong, and sticks well. The individual role sizes are convenient to use.
